stories.text: Are printers really that complex that only three companies (HP, Canon, Epson) can produce them? Why are other major companies (for example DELL, Microsoft, Lenovo, IBM, etc.) completely absent in the printer space? It's not like companies don't use printers.
stories.title: Why are there only three major printer manufacturers

stories.text:
Hey,

I'm doing a research about how worldwide remote teams keep a good level of communication when they're hiring worldwide.

This way, I'd like to know what's your favorite methods to communicate as remote team and ensure the team keeps focused and happy.

Here is a quick template of questions about answers I'm looking for :)

1. What are the difficulties you face with remote communication with worldwide remote team ? 2. How do you try to solve it ? 3. What's your job ?

Many thanks <3
stories.title: Research about worldwide remote team communication
Open source algorithm paper – costs 50$ to accesss
